column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Went there around 6:45 and people were already eating there. I tried the fresh berry pancakes -- you can get 3 or 5 in a stack
column2: and the 3 was just right. It's medium sized pancake
column3: not the small dollar sized pancake.  The waitstaff was very friendly
column4: and will ask you if it's the first time.  The sausages were good
column5: although nothing out of the ordinary. Coffee was good
column6: and I probably got a fresh batch.  Easy walk from the hotels that are in the New East Side.
